channel.title: Offensive Security Tools on Daniel Wyleczuk-Stern
channel.description: Recent content in Offensive Security Tools on Daniel Wyleczuk-Stern

item.title: Adding to the Dialogue - On the Release of Offensive Security Tools (OST)
item.description: Twitter is a complicated social networking platform. Then again, which platform isn’t? I’m fairly new to the platform, but I’ve already found that it can be a tremendous resource when it comes to receiving up-to-date information on new techniques, upcoming talks, or nifty vulnerabilities. What I haven’t found it useful for is having discussions, especially those surrounding a controversial idea. This has manifested in my feed over the past month with the discussion around the release of Offensive Security Tools, primarily ignited by Andrew Thompson (@QW5kcmV3).
